attributes.action: increase punishments 4 those who commit obscure crimes (also legalise the death penalty for later)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These include looking odly at me for the duratian of over 1 minate, annoying my dog, lookin ugly in public, rejecting my friend requests on myspace, rejecting me petitions, not employing me on the grounds of my incompetance. Will add more when you approve this.

If u sign this I will be your friend. Thanx, ur pal - uncle joey

DONT ATTCK IRAQUE

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
